explanation: [0-0] An outdoor environment at night. The camera faces a brick walkway leading to a sports field with floodlights. On the left side of the walkway, there is a tall blue pillar with sponsor logos printed on it. In the distance, several people can be seen wearing clothes of different colors. Above, there is white English text "Pov: root is so down to earth", and a red heart.

[0-10] Then, the camera slowly pans left to show more of the walkway and pillars. A man wearing a pink hat and a navy blue top is walking on the walkway. He is surrounded by several people, one of whom is wearing a uniform.
